description:
"Once on the fringes of conventional psychology, NLP is now studied, taught and practiced all over the planet" ~ Paul McKenna, TV Presenter & Best-Selling author

NLP is increasingly popular in businesses, organisations and private life... That's because it gets results!

Probably the world's most famous NLP Practitioner is Tony Robbins, advisor to Presidents, film stars, leading sports figures and business people.

This Webinar is for anyone who is new to NLP.


It's important to realise that you cannot really learn the skills of NLP from a book. You can 'know' NLP by reading a book, but this is selling yourself short. To truly experience the power of NLP you have to learn the skills and then practice these. The good news is that the world is full of endless opportunities to practice and develop yourself!  

So, join us in the comfort of your own home for this short FREE webinar to get some experience learning NLP. 

"If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you've always got... and there's always more!" 


What will we do? 

We will take you through some of the core principles and models of NLP. NLP is not a theory. It is a collection of models of excellence that work and it draws on some theories to explain these. Therefore, the art and science of NLP lies in your ability to contextualise and apply it in everyday life. 

How will you learn?

Because we'll be using the coolest webinar software on the planet, Webinars OnAir, we'll be able to create much of the atmosphere of our live events. Webinars OnAir runs on Google+ using Google Hangouts. You can take part even if you don't have a Google+ account, however, we recommend that you get one to take advantage of the full features. That way we can bring people live into the Webinar room.

I'll be taking you through the material and we'll be able to combine this with demonstrations and short exercises so you get to see, hear and feel NLP at work. Webinars OnAir has a cool whiteboard feature for capturing your comments and there will also be ample time for questions. 


Above all, we will emphasise learning by doing and having lots of fun! ;-)

No prior NLP knowledge or experience is required to attend this event.

What if you want to join us?

Logistics: 

Start: 20:00

Finish: 21:30

Price: FREE!

Because this is a Webinar there are no capacity or location restrictions. Just supply your email address in the question box below and we'll send you an invitation. You don't need to download any software or plug-ins. Just simply click on the link. If you know some friends outside of Belgium who might like to join us then by all means invite them. 

Only the organiser can see your responses to the RSVP questions... 


Your guide

Gerry Murray founded Wide Circle in 2003 and established the NLP-in-Brussels Meetup community in 2009. Today, Wide Circle is the leading provider of NLP Training in English in Belgium and provides personal development and talent management services to organisations.

Among other things, Gerry is a certified Master Coach and Master TimeLine Therapy® Practitioner, an NLP Trainer and an Instructor of Hypnosis. He has been trained/certified by both the co-creators (John Grinder, Richard Bandler) and many of the leading developers of NLP including: Robert Dilts, Judith DeLozier, Joseph O’Connor, Charles Faulkner, Judith Lowe, David Shephard, Stephen Gilligan, Shelle Rose Charvet, David Molden, Michael Grinder. 

He is also a HATS (Harrison Assessments Talent Solutions) consultant. HATS is a powerful tool for helping organisations manage talent and for individuals to manage their careers. 

Since 2011, Gerry is the Ambassador in Belgium for the ANLP (Association for NLP) the only independent NLP body in the world, whose mission is to improve and uphold ethics and standards in NLP.

description:
Join our Coaching Assistants Program and take your learning to a whole new level! 


Any skills that we have can become rusty if not used regularly. It’s no different with NLP. The skills you’ve learned and mastered on your NLP training courses need to be kept oiled, at the very least. In contrast, you can avail of all opportunities to stretch yourself and develop your skills further going well beyond merely oiling the machine to attaining a level of true mastery. 

You must have at least an NLP Practitioner certification from a recognised NLP school to become a coaching assistant. 

Therefore, we are pleased to invite you to join us in creating what will become one of the best training experiences in the field of personal transformation: our Coaching Assistants Program. The aim of this program is to provide you with significant personal growth and development, increased familiarity with NLP course content and to be trained and associated with Wide Circle and its training team. 

The program is designed so you can provide course participants with quality support and attention during our seminars.  As a Coaching Assistant, you will feel an enormous sense of self satisfaction when you see how significantly you contribute to others – both individually and as a team.  The programme also provides ongoing support to our trainers to ensure the deliverance of brilliant trainings.

You get the benefit of ‘participating’ from an observer position and in doing so will begin to appreciate the level of skill you already have and what you specifically need to work on.

From our experience of assisting on trainings, we know that this program offers team spirit, support, acknowledgement and above all, lots of fun.  We have learned enormous amounts about working with people and about the power of a focused team in achieving results.

If you wish to join us on this program, please attend this Practice Group where we’ll explain and discuss with you what is required and get your input to designing the best Coaching Assistants program around. 

Please register here today!

name: STOP PRESS: Why TimeLine Therapy could be the answer to all your problems!

description:
Change your mind, Change your world

Create your future the way you want it to be

• Is there currently something missing from your life?

• Are there things from the past making you feel angry or sad?

• Do you have beliefs that get in the way of you getting what you want?

• Do you feel stuck in a job or relationship that’s going nowhere?

• Have you set goals but not achieved them yet?

“Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.” ~ George Bernard Shaw

Why do you want to do this program?

Many people are not totally happy with some aspect of their life. Our research shows that many people are not happy at work. They feel stuck, overwhelmed, not appreciated etc but don't know what to do about it. We frequently meet others who are not happy in their personal life. They feel alone, unfulfilled and sometimes lost!

When you think ahead what future do you want to create for yourself and your family? What dreams do you have for love, happiness, health, career, financial independence, freedom? Have you ever wondered why some people seem to be able to create these things effortlessly and easily and other people find life a struggle? 

You may be experiencing some of the above or you may simply be curious about how well NLP works.

What you think affects how you feel. How you feel has a dramatic impact on the results you get in your life. When you think in a new way, you get to do new things and feel new things. This means you are able to produce much better results in all areas of your life. 

This 2 day workshop will give you the tools to deal with things from the past and create your future the way you want it to be. At the end of it you'll leave with an action plan for getting more of what you want out of life. Imagine all that and having lots of fun in the process!

Register & Pay either on Meetup or  here

What will you learn?

In this program we will teach you some of the core NLP principles. Therefore, it gives you an opportunity to experience NLP first hand and will also serve as a foundation in NLP for anyone who is interested in becoming an NLP Practitioner. Existing Practitioners will benefit too. We will cover the following:

• 7 reasons why you may not be getting what you want in life

• 7 reasons why some people consistently get what they want in their life

• How to create a mindset for success

• How your mind is creating your future right now

• Empowering beliefs for a better life

• The secrets and power of your unconscious mind

• How to improve your ability to learn new things

• Simple ways to reduce and manage stress and relax more

• Let go of feelings such as anger, sadness, fear, hurt and guilt from your past

• How to feel the way you want, when you want to

• How beliefs rule your world and how to change them

• The keys to ongoing motivation and drive

• The secret to making goals work

• And much more...

How is this possible in just 2 days?

By applying the principles and tools of NLP you can produce lasting change in your life quickly and easily. You will be guided on a powerful journey of self-discovery and you'll learn by doing. Through a series of exercises you'll combine personal reflection and interaction with others to create a rich learning experience.

You'll also receive:

A short home study NLP foundation program to help you prepare for the weekend and that you can use afterwards to continue to create your future the way you want it.

Please note:

NLP is not talking therapy. It works on the structure NOT the content of a given problem. Therefore, you will never have to reveal or discuss your specific problems with anyone during this seminar unless you choose to do so.

What if you complete this program?

You will join the millions of people around the world who have benefitted from NLP and have better lives as a result. You will also receive a certificate in the foundations of NLP that you can use when applying for other NLP courses in the future. And, if you decide later to complete the full NLP Practitioner or Master Practitioner certification training you can deduct the fee that you pay for this program from the NLP Practitioner/Master Practitioner course fee*. 

Co-creator of NLP, Richard Bandler, points out that too many people who make changes wait until their problems become totally unbearable. Why wait that long?

This is your unique chance to experience the power of NLP, get certified and have fun!

To get a sense of the experience you can watch this video.

http://youtu.be/C_4mKk45FlA

Register & Pay either on Meetup or here

What if this program is not for you?

If this program is not for you but you still have problems that you want to address perhaps you prefer to do either our Back on Track or our Breakthrough coaching program. These are one-on-one confidential, personalised coaching programs. Call Gerry Murray on[masked] for more information.

Gerry Murray founded Wide Circle in 2003. Today, it's a leading personal development company. He'd been through all of the above experiences many times until he discovered and mastered the skills of NLP. His mission is to empower people to lead the life they want and to have the freedom to be who they want to be. Today, he provides webinars, seminars, NLP products & training, and coaching to thousands of individuals who want to create a better future for themselves and their loved ones.

name: Change your Mind, Change your World

description:
“I found that the way in which Bryce and Gerry delivered the course material was exceptional. I would highly recommend anyone to learn from them” - Steven Bonthrone, Scotland

NLP Coaching & Time Line Therapy® Practitioner Certifications training (2 certificates in 1) 


• Imagine making a real difference to other peoples lives

• Imagine what you would see, hear and feel when you have the skills to free yourself from any limitations in your life

• Imagine you can work with others to enable them to unlock their true full potential

• Imagine being able to create things the way you want them in all areas of your life

• Imagine coaching other people to do the same...


Please note: You must be at least a certified NLP Practitioner to attend this training. If in doubt please contact us or refer to our 2015 Certified NLP Practitioner training. 

Register & Pay on Meetup or via Eventbrite 

Why do you want to become an NLP Coach?

In this highly competitive and fast-moving business environment personal and business coaching has become an important part of many a leader’s life and career. Being able to help outstanding professionals to maintain and enhance their work performance and life quality is one of the top-wanted qualifications and one of the most rewarding skills a coach can possess.

Sometimes traditional Coaching doesn't seem to work and this is because it doesn't always address 3 of the most common reasons that people are not achieving what they want in life and work:

• Limiting Beliefs about themselves and others

• Unresolved negative emotions from the past (e.g. fear)

• Ineffective strategies

Many NLP Practitioner programs give you the elements of a coaching toolkit. Few teach you how to use this toolkit consistently to produce lasting results. 

We offer all existing NLP Practitioners and Master Practitioners a unique opportunity to obtain these qualifications and skills by attending NLP Coaching and Time Line Therapy® Practitioner certification training with certified Master Time Line Therapy® and NLP Coach Trainer Bryce Redford.

What will we cover?

On the first day, you will learn the advanced techniques of TimeLine Therapy®/Creating Your Future Coaching Techniques.

TimeLine Therapy® is one of the most exciting developments in NLP, created by Dr. Tad James. It utilizes a person’s own internal “TimeLine” to work with their unconscious mind in a variety of ways, including: healing emotional traumas and eradicating unwanted thoughts, emotions, limiting beliefs, internal conflicts and behaviors.

Our past life experiences, and the memories associated with them, impact on how we approach our lives now. Time Line Therapy® techniques enable you to eliminate many types of issues in your past, thus allowing you to move forward toward your goals and desires.

During the training you will learn how to rid yourself of the 5 primary negative emotions: anger, sadness, fear, hurt and guilt. Eliminate limiting beliefs that are holding you back. Deal with anxiety about events in the future and heal up any internal conflicts.

Techniques learned at this training not only will enhance your personal life quality and professional excellence, but you'll also increase your effectiveness working with others and your ability to empower yourself for optimum results.

NLP not only equips you with powerful self-development tools and techniques, but also helps you to enhance your professional performance.

In the 2nd part of this training you will learn how to create advanced coaching strategies by combining all your NLP skills and knowledge and Time Line Therapy® techniques.

NLP Coaching Practitioner Skills can be widely applied in:

• Business and Personal Coaching

• Sales, Marketing and Communication

• Learning and Educational Coaching

• Therapy and Relationship Coaching

• Sports and Performance Coaching

How will you learn this?

The full course is accompanied by 2 training manuals and a short audio program to enable you to prepare for the live training.

You’ll learn the skills through a combination of watching demonstrations and by doing many exercises. On day 2 you’ll conduct a live coaching session with a real coaching client thereby getting a chance to apply all your skills.

What if you attend?

• You’ll develop the skills and capabilities to consistently achieve more of what you want in your life and work, and less of what you don't want -  and you’ll be able to enable others to do the same

• You’ll learn how to coach people to remove the three things that can stop them achieving their goals thus making you more effective as a Coach

• You’ll explore how your new Coaching skills can enhance your capabilities in all areas of your life and business

• You’ll learn how to identify and clear interference that comes between capability and performance and teach this to others

• You’ll be eligible to complete the Master TimeLine and Master Coaching modules on the Master Practitioner PLUS program in 2015.

Certifications

• NLP Coaching Practitioner

• Secrets of Creating Your Future Coaching Techniques (Timeline Therapy®) Practitioner.

All certificates are accredited by the American Board of NLP (ABNLP) and the TimeLine Association.

Prices (VAT/BTW/TVA incl)

Investment Price: €750 (after 29th October 2014)

Early Booking: €450 (before 29th October 2014)

Register & Pay on Meetup or via Eventbrite 

Logistics


Sign in: 9:00

Start: 9:30

Finish: 18:30

Trainers

Bryce Redford is Associate Director of Change & Coaching at Wide Circle. He has an MBA in International Business, International Marketing and Change Management and over 20 years business experience leading and managing change and he was the first ABNLP certified NLP Coach Trainer in Europe.

Bryce trained as a facilitator and high performance coach to enhance his skills in project management and change. Still, he found there was something missing from traditional coaching which led him to discovering & exploring what NLP could offer. This took his coaching to a new level, supporting individuals he works with taking their performance beyond what they had previously thought possible.

Bryce continued the journey of exploring and training in NLP – becoming a trainer of NLP and Hypnosis (David Shephard), Timeline Therapy® and NLP Coach Trainer (Tad James – developer of Timeline Therapy®). Moreover, he has studied Master Coaching with Joseph O'Connor - one of the most respected individuals in the field of NLP Coaching.

Gerry Murray founded Wide Circle in 2003 and established the NLP-in-Brussels Meetup community in 2009. Today, Wide Circle is the leading provider of NLP Training in English in Belgium.

Gerry is a certified Master Coach and TimeLine Therapy® Practitioner, an NLP Trainer and an Instructor of Hypnosis. He has been trained/certified by both the co-creators (John Grinder, Richard Bandler) and many of the leading developers of NLP including: Robert Dilts, Judith DeLozier, Joseph O’Connor, Charles Faulkner, Judith Lowe, David Shephard, Stephen Gilligan, Shelle Rose Charvet, David Molden, Michael Grinder. 

He is also the Ambassador in Belgium for the ANLP (Association for NLP) the only independent NLP body in the world, whose mission is to improve and uphold ethics and standards in NLP.

name: Save the date!

description:
This certified NLP Master Practitioner program with Home Study is organised in 3 parts to make it easier and faster for busy people to attend. It will run parallel with the NLP Practitioner course.


We're also offering a part 4 as a Master Practitioner PLUS option for anyone who wants to obtain 3 additional Master Practitioner Certifications in NLP Coaching, TimeLine Therapy and Hypnotherapy. 


• Part 1 - 27 Feb-1st March 2015

• Part 2 - 27-29 March 2015 


• Part 3 - 24-26 April 2015

Save the dates. Please RSVP if you're interested. More details to follow.

• Part 4 - 27-31 May 2015 (Master Prac PLUS)

Why do you want to become an NLP Master Practitioner?

The NLP Master Practitioner Course takes your NLP skills to the highest possible level through a combination of personal study, classroom training and hands-on application. When you become an NLP Master Practitioner you’ll have a greater in-depth insight into the workings of the human mind and the physical world we all live in.  You will be introduced to advanced NLP practices that will give you an unmatchable perspective into the functioning of your life.

Our research into the Future of Work demonstrates that mastery of NLP will enable you to better navigate the challenges ahead. Therefore, we encourage you to contextualise your learning around the workplace. After all, most of us will spend over one third of our lives at work. Why not enjoy this experience? 

In many cases, we have to work with people that we would not necessarily choose as friends or family members. Yet, we need the cooperation of others to get our own jobs done. Building lasting relationships and the ability to collaborate effectively have become pre-requisites for success in the workplace, along with a host of other skills that NLP provides. Work affects your private life and your private life affects your work. So, to apply these skills at work you need to be able to apply them to our life as a whole. 

Coaching is becoming an essential leadership skill. Therefore, you will learn in parallel with our NLP Practitioner participants so you can enhance your sensory acuity, deepen your rapport, develop your coaching abilities and fine tune all your NLP skills. You’ll become an expert and elegant master.

For those who want to apply their NLP skills as professional coaches (whether full-time or part-time) and get additional certifications as a Master Coach, Master TimeLine Practitioner and Master of Hypnosis, we offer Master Practitioner PLUS. Details below. 

What will you learn to master?

NLP Master Practitioner will give you advanced skills in the following areas:

1. Conversational Change 

Learn advanced language patterns for challenging perceptions and beliefs and to help you communicate to individuals, groups and teams in a positive, progressive and persuasive way. You’ll learn the art and science of conversational change, an elegant way to informally enable someone else to solve problems and make changes: 

• Using the language of time 

• Conversational belief change 

• Sleight of Mouth patterns 

• Meta-model III - directionalised questioning

• Time release suggestions 

• Prime Concerns - linguistic life change 

2. Values & Metaprograms 

Learn how to elicit, utilise and work with personal Values and Metaprograms - the matrix of our personality and the prime source of our motivation. Learn why people prefer to do things the way they do and how this can help you when working with others:

• Values elicitation 

• Identifying and healing Values conflicts that prevent you from getting what you want

• Values levels and personal evolution 

• How to change Values 

• Eliciting Meta-Programmes

• Using Values and Meta-Programmes in sales, recruitment, and management

• Using the 12-minute Meta-Programs and Values Inventory (MPVI)

• Changing the matrix of personality 

3. An Insiders guide to advanced sub modalities and meaning

• Learn how to use advanced sub modalities in change work

• Using neurological drivers to create change

• Creating designer SWISH patterns

• How to improve anchors with sub modalities

• How what we think affects how we feel 

4. Working with advanced Strategies 

• Learn a process for conversational strategy change 

• Eliciting and utilising strategies in modelling, negotiations, sales

• Strategy installation and change

5. Modelling Excellence

• How to model and replicate excellence - a project based assignment to model excellence in a chosen area and to build a repeatable model for use within a given context e.g. at work. This project is conducted between modules 1 & 2 and presented in module 3:

• How to model excellence in others and then install the model in yourself

• How to create a training programme to install models of excellence 

6. Mastering Public Speaking

Learn how to integrate and utilise all your NLP skills to become a confident and engaging world-class presenter without notes or slides including:

• Building group rapport

• The Secrets of NLP Trainers

7. Creating High Performing Teams

Learn how to recruit, engage, retain, develop and promote talent at work through an in depth insight into Harrison Assessment Talent Solutions (HATS). Use NLP techniques to deliver the HATS Paradox Coaching methodology. This unique and excellent tool is an ideal foundation for personal development and training. You will also learn how to use the HATS Paradox Team Graph together with the Neurological Levels Alignment Model to align a team behind a common purpose and formulate a plan that leverages the values, beliefs and skills of the team. These tools are invaluable when initiating organisational change or creating high performing teams.

You’ll also learn how to apply your NLP skills to project management. 

How can you learn all this in 9 days?

You will do approximately 50 hours of easy personal study before attending the training. This takes the form of listening to our audio product, watching videos and reading books. You’ll also complete a HATS Smart Questionnaire and receive your own personal Paradox Report. This will enable you to focus your learning on specific areas for development. During the training (approx 70 hours) you will be putting what you have learnt into practice and developing new distinctions. In between modules 1 & 2 you’ll undertake a modelling project for which we allocate 20 hours of study. During the course you’ll also receive personal coaching from our team of highly qualified coaches.

NLP Master Practitioner PLUS

This additional course module is for certified NLP Master Practitioners who want to take their NLP skills to an even higher level and get 3 additional Master Practitioner qualifications. After you've completed the 9-Day Master Practitioner you'll be eligible to attend. If you have not completed your Practitioner or Master Practitioner certification with Wide Circle, you’ll be required to complete Wide Circle’s Home Study program in advance of this module.

Personal Breakthrough Coaching 

• How to deliver personal breakthrough sessions for therapy and business. 

• Experience giving and receiving a five-hour breakthrough session during the training. 

NLP and Quantum Physics

• Simple introduction to quantum physics and personal change. 

• The Holographic Universe and healing. 

• The physics of personal empowerment.

Time Line Therapy® Master Practitioner Certification

• Taking a detailed personal history. 

• Releasing negative emotions like anger, sadness, fear, and guilt from the past.

• Deleting limiting decisions and beliefs.

• The Creating The Future Process® .

• Using Time Line Therapy® techniques to assist clients in healing the symptoms of cancer, AIDS, bulimia, anorexia, herpes, hypertension, depression, panic attacks, and abuse. 

Master Hypnotist Certification

• Learn the hypnosis techniques of three acknowledged masters; Erickson, Estabrook and Elman. 

• Use the full continuum of trance inductions; direct-authoritarian, indirect-permissive and client-centred. 

• Induce all the classic hypnotic phenomena. 

• The hypnotic general healing paradigm.

Master NLP Coaching Certification

Integrating all your NLP skills to become an NLP Master coach.

What if you decide to become a Master Practitioner of NLP?

• You'll have enhanced Leadership skills & abilities 

• You’ll become exquisite at communication, learning & change

• You’ll be able to consistently create your future the way you want it to be

• You’ll have a positive impact on yourself, others and the planet

• You’ll be eligible to advance to NLP Trainer level

Master Practitioner

Full investment price: €2,950

Early Booking price: €2,450

Master Practitioner Plus

Full investment price: €3,950

Early Booking price: €3,450

name: NLP Master Practitioner Certification - Part 1

description:
An easier and faster way to learn NLP and more

Especially for busy people, the most complete and flexible way to learn NLP by combining pre-study with classroom learning. Offered in English over 3 long weekends in Brussels this unique approach minimizes the amount of time you need to take out from work or family and eliminates the additional costs of traveling to an English-speaking country. 


What will I learn on the NLP Practitioner Certification program?

The underlying principles of NLP - the foundations of excellence

• A simple model of communication that will enable you to understand how others make sense of the world and to always get your message across

• Empowering beliefs that will change the way you experience and interact with the world around you

• Understand the mind and body as a system and how to take control of this

• Develop a Mindset for Excellence

• Learn how we filter our experience to create out perception of the world

• Discover how Meta Programs, Values and Beliefs are key to how we motivate ourselves and behave

Well-formed Outcomes - the keys to getting what you want 

• Ask questions that enable you to get totally clear about what you really want 

• How to set goals so that you consistently achieve them

• How to enable others to get similar results

Rapport - the essence of connecting, persuasion and influence

• Quickly connect with others

• Discover the real secrets to body language

• Get people to unconsciously identify with you

• Use your voice to build rapport rapidly on the telephone

• Elegantly disagree with others whilst maintaining rapport

• Know how to get back in rapport when someone else breaks rapport with you

Representational Systems - how we use our senses 

• Discover how we make sense of the world 

• Learn to match another person’s preferred system to create rapport and deep understanding

• Discover how others think and process 

Submodalities - the finer distinctions of how we give meaning to things

• Learn how to use your brain’s programming language

• Discover how someone internally structures their reality and how to influence that

• Use submodalities to quickly change unwanted feelings, behaviors and habits

Language Patterns - how to use language with awareness, elegance and precision

• Use your language with volition to gain greater acceptance of your message

• Learn how to ask questions that get you the information you need with speed and precision

• Know the best question to get to the root of a problem

• How to overcome objections elegantly

• Learn powerful conversational techniques to assist someone in changing their mind

• Negotiate with elegance and quickly gain agreement on opposing points of view

Anchoring - how we’re influenced by associative conditioning

• Strengthen your personal resources and your ability to access them whenever and wherever you want

• Remove bad feelings from past experiences

• Create powerful resources to get people out of “stuck” states such as procrastination or confusion

Strategies - the unconscious processes we use to create all our behavior 

• Learn how we do what we do 

• Discover your own and other people’s decision-making strategy

• Understand the basis of NLP modeling

• Change your less useful strategies for more useful ones and use your effective strategies more often

Frames - how we derive meaning from our experiences

• Learn how our frames of reference affect our interpretation of events

• Discover how framing impacts our ability to understand things

• Learn how pre-framing enables you to deal with potential objections

• Expand your choices by becoming skilled at re-framing

• Resolve conflicts easily and quickly

• Become a skilled negotiator

• Help others find better ways of solving problems

Parts - the key to personal congruence

• Learn how to resolve internal conflicts 

Timelines - get more of what you want in your life 

• Understand how you process time 

• Elicit your time line

• Change the direction and location of your time line

• Learn how to use your time line to create your future the way you want it to be 

How can I learn all this in just 9 days? 

Before attending the live training you study from a specially produced Home Study program, which is included in the price of the training. We also provide you with a recommended reading list.

The pre-study takes about 70 hours, which you can do at your own convenience. During the live training you’ll learn the latest developments and distinctions and get to practice what you’ve learned. You’ll also get coaching during the exercises from our team of qualified coaching assistants.

What if you could get an in-depth insight into your strengths and areas for further development? What if this enabled you to get the maximum value out of the training by focusing on these development areas? What difference would that make?

By completing the HATS Smart QuestionnaireTM you can get just that. The Smart QuestionnaireTM provides a comprehensive analysis of work preferences, interests and interpersonal tendencies. Based on your responses to the questionnaire you’ll receive a HATS Paradox Report to which you can refer to throughout the training.

Prior to attending the training you will also receive a coaching call from a member of our team to check how you’re progressing with your pre-study and to go through your HATS Paradox Report with you.

Who will be leading the training?

The Practitioner training is led by Gerry Murray. 

Gerry founded Wide Circle in 2003 and established the NLP-in-Brussels Meetup community in 2009. Today, Wide Circle is the leading provider of NLP Training in English in Belgium.

Gerry is a certified Master Coach and TimeLine Therapy® Practitioner, an NLP Trainer and an Instructor of Hypnosis. He has been trained/certified by both the co-creators (John Grinder, Richard Bandler) and many of the leading developers of NLP including: Robert Dilts, Judith DeLozier, Joseph O’Connor, Charles Faulkner, Judith Lowe, David Shephard, Stephen Gilligan, Shelle Rose Charvet, David Molden, Michael Grinder. 

He is also the Ambassador in Belgium for the ANLP (Association for NLP) the only independent NLP body in the world, whose mission is to improve and uphold ethics and standards in NLP.
